name: Springans Booty
text: If a face-up Xyz Monster(s) you control leaves the field by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; players cannot activate that Effect Monster's effects on the field this turn (even if this card leaves the field). You can send this face-up card to the GY; activate 1 "Great Sand Sea - Gold Golgonda" directly from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Springans Booty" once per turn.
